changeSet.author: rgalante
changeSet.comment: migrating existing RESTYPE permissions to restrictions
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'CREATE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'NEW_RESTYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'READ', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'EDIT_RES_TYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'DELETE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'DELETE_RESTYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'UPDATE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)+5) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'UPDATE', 1 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)+5) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'UPDATE', 1 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'SAVE_ALL_PROPERTIES' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

update.where: permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'EDIT_RES_TYPE' or value = 'DELETE_RESTYPE')
permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'SAVE_ALL_PROPERTIES') AND v = 0
permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES') AND v = 0
permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES' or value = 'SAVE_ALL_PROPERTIES') AND v = 1

delete.where: permissions_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'RESOURCETYPE' OR value = 'EDIT_RES_TYPE' OR value = 'DELETE_RESTYPE' or value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES' or value = 'SAVE_ALL_PROPERTIES')
value = 'EDIT_RES_TYPE' OR value = 'DELETE_RESTYPE' or value = 'SAVE_ALL_CHANGES' or value = 'SAVE_ALL_PROPERTIES'
